scripts.dev:docEngine: concurrently "cd node_modules/obojobo-express && yarn dev" " cd node_modules/obojobo-document-engine && yarn start"
scripts.test: cd node_modules/obojobo-document-xml-parser && yarn test && cd ../obojobo-express && yarn test && cd ../obojobo-document-engine && yarn test
scripts.precommit: cd node_modules/obojobo-express && yarn precommit && cd ../obojobo-document-engine && yarn precommit
